text: McMinn County is a county located in the U.S. state of Tennessee. In the 2020 census, 53,276 people lived there. The county seat is Athens. The McMinn County School Board decided Jan. 10 to remove “Maus” from its curriculum, news outlets reported. Art Spiegelman won the Pulitzer Prize in 1992 for the work that tells the story of his Jewish parents living in 1940s Poland and depicts him interviewing his father about his experiences as a Holocaust survivor. ==References== Category:Tennessee counties
title: McMinn County, Tennessee
